channel.title: SoftPortal.com: new versions of the software
channel.description: List of updated programs in the last 24 hours at Softportal.com

image.title: SoftPortal.com: new versions of the software

item.title: Wise Disk Cleaner 11.0.7.821
item.description: Wise Disk Cleaner is a tool for the complete cleaning of hard disks from accumulated system trash. It can delete unnecessary files in automatic mode, defragment the hard disk, and detect 50 types of junk files

item.title: Internet Download Manager 6.42 build 3
item.description: Internet Download Manager is designed for organizing downloads from the Internet. Various methods of accelerating downloads, dynamic segmentation of files and simultaneous downloading of several parts, use of free open connections

item.title: F.lux 4.130
item.description: F.lux is a small utility useful for those who spend a lot of time in front of the monitor. Depending on the time of day, the app automatically changes the color scheme of your screen to make it more comfortable for your eyes

item.title: NAPS2 7.3.0
item.description: NAPS2 (Not Another PDF Scanner 2) is a very handy tool for scanning documents and saving them as PDF or image files
item.category: Office, documents / PDF, text editors, OCR

item.title: Hasleo WinToUSB Free 8.5
item.description: Hasleo WinToUSB is a tool to install and run the Windows operating system from a USB flash drive

item.title: CrystalDiskInfo 9.2.2
item.description: CrystalDiskInfo is one of the best software for checking the status of hard drives that support S. M. A. R. T. technology. It performs detailed diagnostics and displays complete information with an assessment of the" health " of the installed hard

item.title: Adobe Reader 23.008.20470
item.description: Adobe Reader is the most popular application for working with PDF documents. Allows you to perform all the basic operations: reading, copying, printing, changing the orientation of pages, etc. In addition, it allows you to integrate text, graphics and med
item.category: Office, documents / PDF, text editors, OCR

item.title: Adobe Acrobat Reader 24.1.0.30989
item.description: Adobe Reader-the application will quickly open the necessary PDF file, both from the device, and from email or cloud storage. A special tool "note" can leave comments or highlight text in a document. Adjust the brightness, scale
item.category: Office, documents / PDF, text editors, OCR

item.title: Ventoy 1.0.97
item.description: Easy-to-use software for creating multi-boot USB memory sticks. Supports most types of operating systems, with more than 620 boot images tested. UEFI Secure Boot, MBR and GPT partitions supported

item.title: Google Chrome Portable 121.0.6167.86
item.description: Google Chrome Portable is a portable (no installation required) version of Google Chrome browser

item.title: Signal Private Messenger 6.44.3
item.description: Signal Private Messenger is a secure messenger that keeps your correspondence and conversations from prying eyes. Messages and calls between users are encrypted with sophisticated cryptographic algorithms, which provides maximum privacy

item.title: Signal Messenger 6.45.0
item.description: A free application that allows users to communicate with each other in real time with maximum privacy and to exchange messages, videos and documents. All messages, calls and chats are secured with end-to-end encryption

item.title: KMPlayer 43.12.203
item.description: The mobile version of one of the most popular video players that allows you to view video files in any format and in high resolution on your Android smartphone. Hardware acceleration is supported, and there is also the ability to control subtitles

item.title: Skype 8.111.0.607
item.description: Skype is a mega-popular program with which you can make voice and video calls to all corners of the globe absolutely for free. The developers claim complete confidentiality of communication and personal data, which is achieved by encrypting traffic

item.title: KMPlayer 4.2.3.8 / 2024.1.25.16
item.description: KMPlayer is a powerful media player that supports all kinds of audio and video file formats and also includes all the filters and codecs necessary for their trouble-free playback. In addition, there is support for subtitles

item.title: Evernote 10.67.0
item.description: Evernote is a tool for storing notes of all kinds: text, voice, photos, PDF files and many others. The saved information will be available for all your devices, including mobile and stationary ones. Notes can be sorted by tags

item.title: Skype 8.111.0.607
item.description: Skype is one of the most popular communication apps in the world. The program supports voice and video calls, file sharing, group chats. You can work in Wi-Fi, 3G and EDGE/GPRS/4G/5G networks. At favorable rates, call mobile and landline phones

item.title: BlueStacks App Player 10.10.1.1001
item.description: BlueStacks App Player is a free emulator that allows you to easily run any Android application on your Windows desktop PC. There is access to the Google Play app store, synchronization with real Android devices

item.title: TeamViewer 15.50.5
item.description: TeamViewer is an application for administering remote computers and servers that uses secure data channels with key exchange and AES session encryption. There is an option to show the screen to other users, file transfer

item.title: Psiphon VPN 3.181 (2024-01-23)
item.description: A censorship circumvention tool designed to access the open Internet, bypassing regional blocking. Allows you to access your favorite sites, broadcasts and social networks and protect your data when connected to open Wi-Fi networks
